name: Cigar1 - Rose Toro
additionalNotes:
Cigar1 is a new line created by J.C. Newman Cigar Co. and Privada Cigar Club. Privada Cigar Club said in a press release that the line has been created for cigar smokers, new and seasoned, who live active, fast-paced lives, and want to be able to include quality cigars in that lifestyle without having 
CIGAR1 is offered in two blends: Rose, which uses an Ecuadorian sungrown habano rosado wrapper, and Cream, which uses a Brazilian mata fina wrapper. Both blends use a Nicaraguan binder and filler, are made at the J.C. Newman PENSA factory.
